page.title: 18Industry - Mossmorran(contd)
page.content: closed system at Braefoot Bay. The natural gasoline is stored in conventional storage and then shipped out - also from Braefoot Bay. Although originally, during constuction Mossmorran created thousands of jobs in the immediate Cowdenbeath area, nearly all of these were lost. This is only one of the bad aspects of the plant. People generally feel that in fact, Mossmorran has provided almost no jobs locally, causing much disappointment. Another key problem is environmental pollution. Although it is claimed the smoke from the flare is colourless tasteless and non-toxic, it can be seen from a distance and causes some disturbance to the local people. Excluding all disadvantages, however, the site for Mossmorran was/
